scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit -p packages/types/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/tools/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/providers/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/runtime/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/tui-lite/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p apps/coding-agent/tsconfig.json
scripts.check: bun run typecheck && bun run test
